post:
RackNerd LLC has launched its new website redesign and client UI! https://www.racknerd.com/ We’re a real company, recently expanded our office space (see pictures here) https://www.racknerd.com/contact-us/

We’re growing at incredible speeds here at RackNerd. This has proven to be a result of our happy end-users, we’re growing by word of mouth, as well as quickly establishing our brand within the market place.
Based on the demand, we’re able to capture additional marketshare by expanding to multiple locations. We’re proud to now deploy KVM VPS in Los Angeles, Dallas, Chicago, San Jose, Atlanta and New Jersey. Our setup is instant, our support is quick and helpful. We truly care about our end users! We’ve also proven to be stable - our customers can attest to this.

About RackNerd

RackNerd introduces infrastructure stability and provides Dedicated Servers, Private Cloud solutions, DRaaS (Disaster-Recovery-as-a-Service), flexible Colocation, Virtual Private Servers and advanced DDoS Mitigation services — maintained by a team with decades of experience in managed services, datacenter operations, and Infrastructure-as-a-Service. With an intrinsic focus on client success and growth, RackNerd has grown steadily while continuing to provide high-quality hosting services at competitive rates.

KVM VPS PROMOTIONS in Los Angeles, Dallas, Chicago, San Jose, Atlanta and New Jersey
